GameSessionId.description: Unique identifier for the game session to get player sessions for. Game session ID format is as follows: 'arn:aws:gamelift:<region>::gamesession/fleet-<fleet ID>/<ID string>'. The value of <ID string> is either a custom ID string (if one was specified when the game session was created) an autogenerated string.

Limit.description: Maximum number of results to return. Use this parameter with NextToken to get results as a set of sequential pages. If a player session ID is specified, this parameter is ignored.

NextToken.description: Token indicating the start of the next sequential page of results. Use the token that is returned with a previous call to this action. To specify the start of the result set, do not specify a value. If a player session ID is specified, this parameter is ignored.

PlayerSessionId.description: Unique identifier for a player session.

PlayerSessionStatusFilter.description: Player session status to filter results on. Possible player session statuses include the following:    RESERVED – The player session request has been received, but the player has not yet connected to the server process and/or been validated.     ACTIVE – The player has been validated by the server process and is currently connected.    COMPLETED – The player connection has been dropped.    TIMEDOUT – A player session request was received, but the player did not connect and/or was not validated within the time-out limit (60 seconds).
